page.title: 03COBERLEY VILLAGE: POPULATION
page.content: Coberley is a very quiet and secluded village. Most people who live there are middle aged in between 30 and 50. They all believe Coberley is very friendly. The people move to Coberley because of the beautiful scenery and also the fact that the houses are within the people's price range. Most of the people there go to work in Cheltenham and most workers use cars to get there. When people leave school most of them leave Coberley in order to find jobs. There is also another reason for them to leave the village. When young couples move in they may well stay for only five or so years. This is because the houses are small and when the couple have a family they will need a larger house and so they will be forced to move.
